tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Defensive Action
programme.desc: A patrolling F-14 malfunctions in a no-fly zone; the crew ejects, and the bird explodes.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Boot.
programme.desc: A woman Marine recruit dies at Parris Island. Harm investigates while Meg poses undercover as a recruit.(n)

programme.title: JAG: The Brotherhood
programme.desc: During a landing exercise Marines find a beaten, comatose fellow Marine on the beach.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Hemlock
programme.desc: By mistake a foreign agent sends a fax to Meg's office; then he retrieves it and shoots Meg to prevent her from identifying him.(n)

programme.title: JAG: High Ground
programme.desc: A Marine sniper receives orders contrary to a previous deal; his CO refuses to listen; the sniper takes a shot at the CO's Humvee.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Djibouti Call
programme.desc: While on a secret mission in Djibouti, Africa, with his new Homeland protege, Tim Armstrong (Scott Porter), Cabe is captured and Team Scorpion must save him.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Twist And Shout
programme.desc: Team Scorpion's mission to recover the remains of fallen Marines in Vietnam is threatened along with their lives when a deadly tornado heads directly towards them.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Hard Knox
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is hired by the Department of Defense to break into Fort Knox and "steal" a precious artifact in order to test their security.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Chernobyl Intentions
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes to Chernobyl to repair the decaying nuclear reactor before a catastrophic meltdown.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Toby Or Not Toby
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must out-think their unstable ex-Scorpion member after he kidnaps Toby and threatens to kill him unless his cunning demands are met.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Wanting
programme.desc: When a tenement-building shooting leads to the discovery of an executed gang leader, 15 Division must race to find the killer before a gang war breaks out.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Going Under
programme.desc: When 15 Division goes undercover at a club-land bar that’s a possible hub for illegal handguns, Chris’s erratic behavior and concern for a specific drug dealer make Dov suspicious.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Two Truths and a Lie
programme.desc: As the officers of 15 Division try to hunt down the killer of Brian Gowdy – Andy and Sam go on the road to interview a list of inmates at Millburn Penitentiary.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Deal with the Devil
programme.desc: In the midst of a chaotic day at the station, Oliver prepares Andy to defend herself at Duncan’s dismissal hearing, now happening two hours from now.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Exit Strategy
programme.desc: Chris’s addiction issues come to a head when an innocuous call to a middle-class home puts Dov and Chris in the middle of a suspicious home invasion investigation.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Tired from this long investigation, the team continue where one of them realises that the idea to investigate along was a mistake, but can the others get there in time. And something has a final message for the team as they leave.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette starts the new series with an investigation at the haunted Eden Camp. Strange noises and an unknown force try to separate the team. Can they endure the entire investigation, or will the paranormal activity prove too much for them to handle?(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and her world-famous team continue investigating Eden Camp. Splitting into lone vigils, they quickly regret it as lost souls, dark shadows, and disembodied voices haunt this living museum, all eager to make their presence known.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Manor of Mystery
programme.desc: A Museum Director and a volunteer are fearful that an upcoming Victorian exhibit about the Victorian Era and Spiritualism will uncover and agitate entities from that time period.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Haunting of the Garde
programme.desc: A 1920's historic theater is rumored to be haunted by one of New London's most prominent whaling families.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Distillery of Spirits
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Buffalo Trace Distillery in Frankfort, Kentucky to investigate hauntings at the oldest operating distillery in America.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: All Too Human
programme.desc: Dylan, Beka and Trance go with Rommie to find out about a weapon being developed on a planet that distrusts AI.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromeda is tasked with escorting medical ships safely through Drago-Kazov space.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Home Fires
programme.desc: A planet of Commonwealth survivors led by Dylan's former fiancee is invited to join the new Commonwealth, but when they vote not to join, the Magog are suspected of playing dirty.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Into the Labyrinth
programme.desc: An agent of the Abyss tries to lure Harper into joining the Magog.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: When they rescue a young prince from an uprising that kills the rest of his family, Dylan and Tyr are asked to be his advisors.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.208
programme.desc: Ex-lovers dispute ownership of a snow blower, weight bench, and alleged loan. License plate found in damaged car from a crash, but alleged party denies responsibility.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.154
programme.desc: A man says he was thrown on top of a car by a club bouncer after being wrongfully accused of hitting someone in the bathroom.\t\t\t\r\nA woman sues her twin brother for allegedly drinking, driving her car without permission, and wrecking it.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.159
programme.desc: Woman regrets co-signing loan with boyfriend. 11-year-old on dirt bike crashes into moving car; driver claims bike appeared suddenly.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.139
programme.desc: Ex accuses ex-boyfriend of car theft; new boyfriend helps buy new car. Roommates feud over tattoos, skydiving, and family illness expenses.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.27
programme.desc: A young woman discovers her boyfriend at his ex-lover’s house and\t\t\t\r\nallegedly takes out her anger on his car/A 10-year-old is accused of running across and damaging the freshly-cemented sidewalk on his neighbor’s driveway.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.31
programme.desc: The emotional burial of a pet Chihuahua leads to a violent, bloody\t\t\t\r\nassault between family members/A woman sues her ex-fiancé for a loan to buy a home. He claims she wrecked his truck while driving drunk, so he’s not paying.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.67
programme.desc: Teenager sued by cousin for drunk driving; blames cousin for letting minors drink. Woman claims sprayed with hose due to dog suspected of relieving on neighbor's lawn.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.193
programme.desc: Custody battle and bounced check drama escalate with Wal Mart "Amber Alert." Mother-daughter lawsuit ensues from car wreck involving hitchhikers.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.120
programme.desc: A woman and her teen daughter accuse an estranged relative of assaulting them at a family party/A woman is suing her former friend for repossessing her truck; her friend argues that the vehicle was never insured.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.189
programme.desc: A handgun comes between a brother and sister who sue over the alleged destruction of property during a heated fight.\t\t\t\r\nAccusing his mother of losing his rightful inheritance, a man denies owing her for unpaid loans and car insurance payments.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The final two chefs are rewarded with a trip to New York, where they are asked to prepare their signature dishes; the chefs must prove their skill and passion by designing and running their own restaurants; Whoopi Goldberg makes an appearance.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The final two chefs have one last dinner service to prove that they have what it takes to work in chef Ramsay's restaurant; the winner is chosen.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Sixteen chefs compete in rigorous culinary challenges under the exacting eye of chef Gordon Ramsay, hoping to win a position at a restaurant in Atlantic City, N.J.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The competition heats up as the teams face another gruelling challenge; one chef is eliminated.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jose Mas, the CEO of MasTec, one of the largest builders of telecommunication and energy systems in North America, poses as a recently laid off high school basketball coach, getting a second chance at starting a new career.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Boss Terry Davis has been with Home Hardware Stores for 42 years. He worked his way up to the top – now he’s returning to the shop floors and factories to turn flaws into fixes.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Smoke, Lead, and Alcohol
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy venture into one of the city's most dangerous neighborhoods, only to find a debtor ready to defend his ride by pumping it full of lead, with no concern for who gets caught in the crossfire.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Missed Dates
programme.desc: First, Lyndah is put in a tough situation - she has to control a sobbing, cop-calling debtor and turn away Frankie's unwanted and inappropriate advances - all at the same time. Then, Matt and Froy have two problems on their hands.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Broken Tooth Lou and Bad Breath Frankie
programme.sub-title: Broken Tooth Lou and Bad Breath Frankie
programme.desc: First, Froy and Lyndah probably need to schedule a trip to the dentist after Lou's tooth gets knocked out in the course of a tense confrontation with two irate debtors. Then, Frankie seriously blows a routine voluntary repo when the owner smells something.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Matt Vs. Giant Chicken
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy cope with the uncertainty of Lou's condition by liberating a Vespa from a leather-clad biker and his rabble-rousing girlfriend. Then, Matt and Froy head out again to claim a Toyota Yaris from a truant children's entertainer.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Segway This Way
programme.desc: First, Matt and Sonia hit the beach to repossess an old-fashioned classic surfer car from an old-fashioned surfer looking for a classic tussle. Then, Froy and Matt stretch their wits to identify and take down an uncooperative Segway renter.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Canals of Deceit
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Froy get messy when they head to Venice Beach to track down and recover a canoe from the world-famous canals. Then, Lyndah and Sonia confront a distraught widow with a terrible secret. And finally, there's no time-out for Lou and Matt...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Captain Lou
programme.desc: First, Lyndah and Matt interrupt a debtor's bicycle ride to repossess his Jeep, but when Matt's buttons get pushed, some bikes might get broken. Then, Froy and Sonia negotiate with a sensible debtor who's more trouble than she seems... or is she? And fina.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Native Operation
programme.desc: First, Matt and Lou confront an ungentlemanly drunk at an upscale gentleman's club in an effort to repossess his late-model BMW. Then, Sonia and Matt head over to the wrong side of the tracks to reclaim a motorcycle from a different kind of biker.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Should Have Seen This Coming
programme.desc: First, Lou, Sonia, and Froy unfurl an elaborate sting when they repo a taxicab by tricking its driver into picking them up. But what to do with his ferociously inebriated client?(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Vampires and Drunks
programme.desc: First, Froy and Sonia take a trip to Beverly Hills to interrupt the salon appointment of a wealthy trophy wife who isn't going to let her prized possession go without a fight. Then, Sonia and Matt use the cover of night to sneak away a Nissan.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Shy Dial
programme.desc: Jeff uses an app on his phone that automatically puts his calls through to Audrey's voicemail. Meanwhile, Adam befriends a clothing salesman who helps him against his friends when he picks up some questionable clothing choices.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cheating
programme.desc: Audrey tries to persuade Jeff to eat healthier when he is diagnosed with high cholesterol, but he can’t help sneaking around with Brenda for unhealthy food.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Chair
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey engage in a battle of wills when she refuses to admit that she hates the armchair she ordered while Jeff pretends to love it.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: To try to show his care and interest in their relationship, Jeff sends Audrey on a scavenger hunt. Russell thinks Jennifer has a sex tape and enlists Timmy's help in finding it.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Big Bust
programme.desc: Audrey believes her maid needs an operation to correct the limp she has to be able to walk better, thinking she is doing the right thing Audrey asks her neighbors to contribute to the cause not having any idea what the money is really intended for.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: After The Lovin'
programme.desc: Frustrated by his boss blaming him for burning his mouth on hot soup, Timmy has a special spoon created for Russell. Audrey's plan backfires when she tries to seduce Jeff in the bedroom in order to get him to complete household tasks.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Missed Connections
programme.desc: Timmy wants to reconnect with a woman he met on the subway; Jeff and Audrey turn on each other when former friends snub them.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Five Things
programme.desc: Jeff can't think of five nice things to say about Audrey; Russell encourages Timmy to serenade a woman; Jennifer and Adam mistakenly get Jeff and Audrey's bank statement.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Meat Wars
programme.desc: Audrey drags Jen to a Bon Jovi concert to prove that she's still young and fun, leaving Jeff and Adam at home. Russell finds a phone number in his pocket and asks Timmy to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Smackdown of Baby Lyssa
programme.desc: After meeting with the cosigner on a bond for a man named John, Dog and the Posse hatch a plan to lure him to a high rise apartment. But when night falls, their plan leaves a member of the team alone and in harm's way!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Friend in Need
programme.desc: Roger has 27 prior arrests, spent years in jail and doesn't want to go back. But he's missed court and now Dog has to bring him in. To complicate matters, this fugitive lives in a tightly-knit community where good information won't come easy.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Your Lying Eyes
programme.desc: Kolani's on the run, left his wife to look after four kids and left Dog holding the bag for the $10k bond. So their pursuit on this case takes them into some parts of Ohau, and the human heart, that few of us will ever see.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Crime Don't Pay
programme.desc: Today the crew is hunting for Holly, a car thief. She's one of Tim's bonds and the entire Dog crew knows that means trouble - or at least a long and difficult chase.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Twisted Love
programme.desc: Dog is tracking down Cecilia, who's wanted for car theft, but she's nowhere to be found. Her girlfriend and co-signer has gone missing too. Just when the trail goes cold, a friend leads the team to the cosigner's empty apartment.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Where the Wild Things Are
programme.desc: Dog, Beth and the team are in Colorado and they face a special challenge - getting the kids to camp. After the drop-off, Dog is more than ready to track down a fugitive. Robin disposed of a body after a homicide, and now he's skipped his court date.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Luv Still
programme.desc: Dog is in search of a potentially dangerous fugitive, he's only 19 and charged with kidnapping and menacing. The case takes an unexpected turn when the Chapman clan ends up in a confrontation with the suspect's family.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Day of the Dog
programme.desc: Dog and the team are back in Colorado hunting bounties. Today's fugitive has a long rap sheet and a reputation for packing heat. With nothing but an address and phone number, the team heads out on the hunt.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Time to Cry
programme.desc: Kimo does a vanishing act for his day in court and now Dog and the posse have to find him. With precious few leads to follow Dog turns to the fugitive's on-again-off-again girlfriend, but she's initially reluctant to join the hunt.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sweatin' Bullets
programme.desc: When a heat wave envelops West Monroe the air conditioning unit at the Duck Commander warehouse goes down, turning the duck call assembly room into a boiling sweatshop.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Spring Pong Cleaning
programme.desc: After Korie decides the junk piles in the Duck Commander warehouse are beginning to reach critical mass, she calls on Willie and the guys to do a little company spring-cleaning.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Morning, West Monroe
programme.desc: After attending a local radio show as a guest, Willie sees an opportunity to host a show of his own.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Of Mattresses and Men
programme.desc: The Jase, Si and the guys from the duck call room take a field trip to a brand new local donut shop and quickly find out who amongst them can eat the most delicious treats.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Samurai Si
programme.desc: Willie receives a special gift from a Japanese business associate - a "priceless" samurai sword, which Willie keeps out of the hands of Jase and the guys.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck No, We Won't Go
programme.desc: Willie pushes his work force too far after implementing new "motivational work tactics," and the guys rise up against him and go on strike.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drag Me To Glory
programme.desc: When NASCAR sensation Clint Bowyer pays a visit to the Duck Commander warehouse, Willie and the guys are fired up to spend the day hanging out with the professional racecar driver.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Season Eve
programme.desc: Tomorrow is the opening day of Duck Season and the men are carrying on their tradition of camping on the Robertson Land the night before.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Can't Hardly Weight
programme.desc: Gearing up for his high school reunion, Willie realizes that he could stand to lose a few pounds. Jase and Korie set out to help him drop some weight and the strenuous battle of man-versus-waistline begins.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Shot Thru The Heart
programme.desc: The guys learn from Willie that John Luke is going through his first break up. In order to make him feel better the men decide to take John Luke hunting for nutria, and impart their relationship wisdom.(n)

programme.title: Space Truckers
programme.desc: A space trucker and his cute fiancee are on their way from a space station to Earth with an unknown cargo. When space pirates hijack them, 5000 disintegrator robots are found in the cargo.(n)

programme.title: Monster Hunters
programme.desc: When an alien prison ship crash lands and unleashes creature after creature in the California desert, they make quick work of the army that tries to stop them.(n)

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: An ex-con and his adopted younger brother are forced to go on the run. Chased by a criminal, the feds, and a cadre of soldiers, their only protection is a found weapon of mysterious ancestry.(n)

programme.title: Timeline: Timeline
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.(n)

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
programme.desc: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War, and the soldiers on both sides that fought it. Feat: Mel Gibson.(n)

programme.title: Freight
programme.desc: A Russian gang in the UK traffics Eastern Europeans and then enslaves them. The women forced into sex, the men into illegal fights. When they cross a local businessman, a war escalates.(n)

programme.title: Christmas in Mississippi
programme.desc: Photographer Holly returns to Gulfport, Mississippi for Christmas. Their traditional holiday light show has been revived again since a hurricane struck five years earlier. She is shocked to learn the festival is run by her high school sweetheart, Mike.(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Karen
programme.desc: Karen is an entitled middle-aged woman whose demanding nature has alienated her loved ones. After a series of instances displaying her privilege, Karen receives an intervention from some unconventional spirits.(n)

programme.title: My Nanny's Secret
programme.desc: Starring Haylie Duff. When a home invasion robbery leaves one member of the wealthy Tyrell family dead, the family's live-in nanny, Claudia, begins to suspect that her troubled brother may be the culprit.(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A teenager wanders into Carmel, California, where he is soon introduced to the art-forgery community.(n)

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Nearly two decades after being committed to a mental institution for killing his stepfather and older sister, Michael Myers breaks out, intent on returning to his hometown. He arrives on Halloween to hunt down his younger sister, Laurie.(n)

programme.title: After Dark, My Sweet
programme.desc: An ex-boxer (Jason Patric), a widow (Rachel Ward) and a con man (Bruce Dern) try a kidnap caper in a desert town.(n)

programme.title: Stagecoach
programme.desc: A stagecoach trip is complicated by Geronimo being on the warpath in the area. The passengers include a drunk doctor, two women, a thieving bank manager, and the famous Ringo Kid. Starring: John Wayne, Claire Trevor, Andy Devine.(n)

programme.title: A Soldier's Revenge
programme.desc: Frank Connor is a Civil War hero turned bounty hunter. When two children turn up on his doorstep, desperate for his help to find their missing mother, Frank finds he must face up to his past and the notorious Major with whom he has an old score to settle.(n)

programme.title: The Man Without A Face
programme.desc: Chuck wants to leave home but can't make the grade for boarding school. Then, he finds out the disfigured recluse (Mel Gibson, "Braveheart") living nearby is an ex-teacher.(n)

programme.title: The Chaperone
programme.desc: Ray’s been asked to chaperone a school trip with his daughter Sally’s class. When characters from Ray’s criminal past believe he stole the loot from a bank they robbed, Ray will do whatever it takes to keep his daughter and her class out of harms way.(n)

programme.title: Blind Dating
programme.desc: A blind young man (Pine) thinks he finds love with an Indian woman (Jay), though their relationship is fraught with cultural differences.(n)

programme.title: Blackball
programme.desc: In the world of spectator sports, there are of course the all time greats: football, rugby, tennis, golf and... lawn bowls? Try as he might, Cliff Starkey (Paul Kaye) just can't keep out of trouble.(n)

programme.title: One Way Out
programme.desc: A policeman risks his career when he accepts a bribe to keep his daughter from being implicated in a robbery.(n)

programme.title: The Riddle of the Sands
programme.desc: Two former British school friends take to the high seas to thwart a German invasion of Britain in 1901.(n)

programme.title: The Upturned Glass
programme.desc: Suspenseful psychological thriller about a prosperous British brain surgeon who plots to murder the woman responsible for the death of the girl he loved.(n)

programme.title: The Dead Zone: Saved
programme.desc: In a bizarre turn of events, Stillson (Sean Patrick Flanery) begs Johnny (Anthony Michael Hall) to help him investigate the disappearance of his girlfriend, Miranda (Laura Harris).(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Extra Innings
programme.desc: Ex-baseball player Ed Hamler, lame from an injury and forced to retire early is given a 1909 baseball card of a player that looks exactly like him. The card is magical in that he becomes drawn into it and lives out the life of the player in the past.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Crossing
programme.desc: A stressed-out priest repeatedly encounters a station wagon containing a young girl. The car keeps crashing and bursting into flames.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Hunters
programme.desc: A young boy falls into an undiscovered cave near a housing project. An archeologist studies strange paintings on its walls and then bizarre things begin to happen. Cave items move around and animals are killed and brought into the cave.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Dream Me a Life
programme.desc: A man in a retirement home dreams of a woman holding back a monster, and in real life realizes the woman is his cataleptic neighbor.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Memories
programme.desc: A hypnotist who specializes in helping people relive their past lives tries to find her own history. She hypnotizes herself and when she awakens, she learns that everyone can now remember their past lives. They also desperately want to forget them.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Hellgramite Method
programme.desc: An alcoholic goes through an extremely painful and potentially deadly cure for his drinking problem. He has to choose which is more important - the bottle or his life.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Our Selina is Dying
programme.desc: A young woman, Debra, comes to live with her mysterious family, including the dying patriarch Selena. After Selena clutches Debra's hand firmly leaving an odd spot on it, Debra begins to age very fast while Selena rejuvenates.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Nubbins
programme.desc: When a mating pair of cute, furry and seemingly harmless abnormals is brought in for scientific study, the Sanctuary team begins to exhibit some hidden animal attractions for one another.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: The Five
programme.desc: While leading a covert meeting in Rome, Magnus encounters Nikola Tesla, an old friend from her past who confides that the Cabal has come to exact revenge on her for the events in 'Fata Morgana'.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Edward
programme.desc: A young artist with an uncanny ability to draw remarkably detailed pictures from memory may be the key to a solving a case surrounding the suspicious death of his abusive father.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Requiem
programme.desc: Magnus and Will investgate a distressing call for help deep below the Bermuda Triangle resulting in a deadly battle to save Magnus’s life.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Friends in Hawaii Places
programme.desc: Allen &Ton enlist an assistant, Carolyn, and Allen's Hawaiian buddy, Junior, to help them battle local buyers. The guys find a WWII-era motor scooter and a stash of antique Polynesian tattoo tools that get used on Ton!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Voodoo Moola
programme.desc: Allen & Ton hit a storage auction in Louisiana's Capitol City and quickly find themselves in trouble with the law! The guys uncover a pair of racing lawnmowers and then stumble on an antique barber chair from the early 1900s!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Drumming Up Cash
programme.desc: Ton & Allen face some silent but deadly competition at an auction in nearby Glendale. They discover a Zildjian brand percussion cymbal from the 1940's and a pyrotechnics control board designed for large-scale fireworks displays!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Quadzilla Attacks!
programme.desc: Extreme Quadzilla ATV, the fastest 4 wheeler ever; a 1910s Remington Derringer and an 1880s Palm Squeezer pistol; revolutionary 1800s Western Electric telephone with a crank dial.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Dead Aim
programme.desc: Ton & Allen face-off against an auction buyer with shady bidding tactics and even more questionable fashion sense. The guys find a custom-built monowheel & a rifle designed to ward off grave robbers in the early 19th century!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sidecar Surprise
programme.desc: An unassuming mom in an oversized sweater tries to pull the wool over Ton & Allen's eyes at a storage auction in Arlington, VA. The guys uncover a black powder cannon designed in the 15th century & a Russian military motorcycle!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Beantown Bidders
programme.desc: 1800s blackpowder whaling harpoon; 1940s Schwinn Town & Country tandem bicycle; a vintage American flag collection that could be worth thousands.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Diesel Digs
programme.desc: The guys head to the industrial hub of LA to score some heavy machinery and unearth a 1981 Bobcat 743 Frontloader, one of the first powered by a diesel engine and a trench-defending WWI German Sturmtrupp helmet bashing mace.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Big Easy Money
programme.desc: Allen & Ton head to New Orleans in search of easy money, but instead encounter some bayou bidders with big-time bucks! They discover a pair of early 19th-century dueling pistols & a vintage airboat fitted with a turbine engine!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fire in the Hole!
programme.desc: 1930s "blasting machine" dynamite detonator box; 1890s treasure chest with secret compartments. Ton smelts jewelry to forge bricks of silver.(n)
